APIERRMSG_ABORTED.description: Error message that is shown if the operation is aborted

APIERRMSG_DEVICE_LIST_ERROR.description: Error message that is shown if there was an error trying to detect removable USB drive and SD cards

APIERRMSG_DOWNLOAD_CANCELLED.description: Error message that is shown if the user cancels the write operation during download

APIERRMSG_DOWNLOAD_HASH_MISMATCH.description: Error message that is shown if the downloaded file doesn't hash to the expected value

APIERRMSG_DOWNLOAD_INTERRUPTED.description: Error message that is shown if the downloaded was interrupted for any reason

APIERRMSG_FILE_INVALID.description: Error message that is shown if the file to write is not valid

APIERRMSG_OPERATION_ALREADY_IN_PROGRESS.description: Error message that is shown if user tries to start a new write operation and there is already one in progress

APIERRMSG_UNKNOWN.description: Error message that is shown if no matching error message can be found

APIERRMSG_UNSUPPORTED_OPERATION.description: Error message that is shown if the user triggers an unsupported operation

APIERRMSG_UNZIP_ERROR.description: Error message that is shown if the file cannot be unzipped for any reason

APIERRMSG_UNZIP_INVALID_ARCHIVE.description: Error message that is shown if the file is not a valid ZIP file

APIERRMSG_URL_INVALID.description: Error message that is shown if no file is found at the URL to download

APIERRMSG_VERIFICATION_FAILED.description: Error message that is shown if the image was not written properly

APP_NAME.description: Name of the application. Cannot exceed 45 characters.

APP_SHORT_NAME.description: A short name for the app shown when space is limited. Fewer than 12 characters preferred.

COMPLETED.description: Shown as part of the text 'x% completed'

COMPLETE_BULLET1.message: A Chromebook helyreállításához csatlakoztassa a helyreállítási adathordozót Chromebookjához.

COMPLETE_BULLET2.message: A helyreállítás után a segédprogram használatával törölheti a helyreállítási adathordozót.

CONFIRM_CANCELLED_MESSAGE_HTML.description: Indicates that the operation has been cancelled
CONFIRM_CANCELLED_MESSAGE_HTML.message:
Megszakítva. Ha szeretné újból megpróbálni, kattintson a ”Létrehozás most” lehetőségre.

A helyreállítási adathordozó törléséhez kattintson a jobb felső sarokban található fogaskerék ikonra.

CONFIRM_MESSAGE_HTML.description: Important message, indicates what the application is going to do
CONFIRM_MESSAGE_HTML.message: Fontos: a helyreállítási adathordozóról az összes adat és partíció törlődik.

CONTINUE_BUTTON_TEXT.description: Text for the continue button at the bottom of the screen

CREATE_ANOTHER_BUTTON_TEXT.description: Text for the button to go back to the start of the application after the recovery disk has been created

CREATE_NOW_BUTTON_TEXT.description: Text for the button to start the recovery disk creation

DONE_BUTTON_TEXT.description: Text for the button to close the application after the recovery disk has been created / Text for the button to go back to the start of the application after the recovery disk has been erased

ERASE_COMPLETE_BULLET1.description: Shown on the erase completed screen
ERASE_COMPLETE_BULLET1.message: Az USB-meghajtó vagy SD-kártya előkészítése megtörtént a formázáshoz.

ERASE_COMPLETE_BULLET2.description: Shown on the erase completed screen
ERASE_COMPLETE_BULLET2.message: Formázás az operációs rendszer által kínált formázási eszköz segítségével.

ERASE_CONFIRM_MESSAGE.description: Important message, indicates what the application is going to do
ERASE_CONFIRM_MESSAGE.message: A helyreállítási adathordozóról törlődik a helyreállítási képfájl és az összes partíció.

ERASE_NOW_BUTTON_TEXT.description: Text for the button to start the recovery disk erasure

ERASE_PROGRESS_TEXT.description: Shown when the drive is being erased
ERASE_PROGRESS_TEXT.message: Ne távolítsa el a helyreállítási adathordozót!

ERASE_PROGRESS_TITLE.description: Title for the screen where the drive is being erased

ERASE_SELECT_TARGET_DETECTING.description: Indicates that the app is currently detecting the list of USB devices

ERASE_SELECT_TARGET_HIGH_CAPACITY_WARNIN.description: Warning that is shown if the user selects a drive with a high capacity

ERASE_SELECT_TARGET_NO_DEVICES_FOUND.description: Indicates that no USB devices were found

ERASE_SELECT_TARGET_SELECT_DEVICE.description: Prompts the user to select a drive
ERASE_SELECT_TARGET_SELECT_DEVICE.message: Válassza ki a törölni kívánt helyreállítási adathordozót.

ERASE_SELECT_TARGET_SELECT_DEVICE_PLACEH.description: Prompts the user to select a drive (text is shown inside the dropdown)

ERASE_TITLE.description: Title for the screens related to erasing

ERRMSG_PLEASE_TRY_AGAIN.description: Error text that is shown after the error message

ERRMSG_RECOVERY_CONFIG_DOWNLOAD_FAILURE.description: Error message that is shown if the app's configuration file cannot be downloaded. In this case, the app will only be able to support offline features.
ERRMSG_RECOVERY_CONFIG_DOWNLOAD_FAILURE.message: A konfigurációs fájl letöltése nem sikerült. Kizárólag az offline funkciók lesznek elérhetők.

GET_STARTED_BUTTON_TEXT.description: Text for the 'get started' button at the bottom of the screen

GO_BACK_BUTTON_TEXT.description: Text for the back button at the bottom of the screen

HOURS_REMAINING.description: A message that indicates the time remaining for an operation.

HWID_INVALID_MODEL.description: Message shown to user when it's clear that what they have entered doesn't match any valid model number.
HWID_INVALID_MODEL.message: Érvénytelen modellszám. Kérjük, ellenőrizze a megadott információkat.

HWID_KEEP_TYPING.description: Message shown to user when they have no yet entered enough info to determine a specific device.
HWID_KEEP_TYPING.message: Egyelőre nem található modell, gépeljen tovább.

HWID_MATCH_FOUND.description: Message shown to user when they have entered enough info to determine a specific device.

HWID_MATCH_FOUND_AND_CHECKSUM_VERIFIED.description: Message shown to user when they have entered a full model number and the checksum is verified.

LEARN_MORE_LINK_TEXT.description: Text for the 'learn more' link at the bottom left of the screen

LOADING_CONFIG_TEXT.description: Message to user indicating that the app is downloading latest information about recovery for different devices. It is preparing itself to be used.

MENU_ITEM_ERASE_RECOVERY_MEDIA.description: Text for the menu item to erase recovery media

MENU_ITEM_SEND_FEEDBACK.description: Text for the menu item to send feedback

MENU_ITEM_USE_LOCAL_IMAGE.description: Text for the menu item to use a local file as the source image for the recovery disk

MINUTES_REMAINING.description: A message that indicates the time remaining for an operation.

OF.description: Shown as part of the text 'step %x of %x'

SECONDS_REMAINING.description: A message that indicates the time remaining for an operation.

SELECT_IMAGE_SELECT_BY_HWID_LINK_TEXT.description: Text for the 'select by model number' link

SELECT_IMAGE_SELECT_FROM_LIST_LINK_TEXT.message: Válassza ki a modellt a listából

SELECT_IMAGE_SELECT_MANUFACTURER_PLACEHO.description: Prompts the user to select a manufacturer (text is shown inside the dropdown)

SELECT_IMAGE_SELECT_PRODUCT_PLACEHOLDER.description: Prompts the user to select a product (text is shown inside the dropdown)

SELECT_IMAGE_TEXT.description: Prompts the user to enter a model number. Refers to the recovery screen.
SELECT_IMAGE_TEXT.message: A helyreállításhoz adja meg a Chromebook modellszámát, amely a helyreállítási képernyőn található.

SELECT_IMAGE_THIS_CHROMEBOOKS_MODEL_NUMB.description: Label that precedes a HWID string (e.g.: LINK D25-E5M-K75) that is the model number for the Chromebook the user is using. The HWID string is hyperlinked and clicking on it will populate the value into the model number input field. In English, this would for example read 'For this Chromebook, enter _LINK D25-E5M-K75_'
SELECT_IMAGE_THIS_CHROMEBOOKS_MODEL_NUMB.message: Ennél a Chromebooknál a következőt adja meg:

SELECT_IMAGE_TITLE.description: Title for the image selection screen

SELECT_TARGET_DETECTING.description: Indicates that the app is currently detecting the list of USB devices

SELECT_TARGET_HIGH_CAPACITY_WARNING_HTML.description: Warning that is shown if the user selects a drive with a high capacity

SELECT_TARGET_LOW_CAPACITY_ERROR.description: Error that is shown if the user selects a drive with not enough capacity
SELECT_TARGET_LOW_CAPACITY_ERROR.message: Az adathordozónak legalább 4 GB méretűnek kell lennie.

SELECT_TARGET_NO_DEVICES_FOUND.description: Indicates that no USB devices were found

SELECT_TARGET_SELECT_DEVICE.description: Prompts the user to select a drive
SELECT_TARGET_SELECT_DEVICE.message: Válassza ki a használni kívánt adathordozót.

SELECT_TARGET_SELECT_DEVICE_PLACEHOLDER.description: Prompts the user to select a drive (text is shown inside the dropdown)

SELECT_TARGET_TITLE.description: Title for the screen where the user selects the target USB device

STAGE_COMPLETE.description: Status text that is shown when the drive is being created

STAGE_DOWNLOAD.description: Status text that is shown when the drive is being created

STAGE_DOWNLOADVERIFY.description: Status text that is shown when the drive is being created

STAGE_UNPACK.description: Status text that is shown when the drive is being created

STAGE_UNZIP.description: Status text that is shown when the drive is being created

STAGE_VERIFY.description: Status text that is shown when the drive is being created

STAGE_VERIFYDOWNLOAD.description: Status text that is shown when the drive is being created

STAGE_VERIFYWRITE.description: Status text that is shown when the drive is being created

STAGE_WRITE.description: Status text that is shown when the drive is being created

STEP.description: Shown as part of the text 'step %x of %x'

UNSUPPORTED_TEXT.description: Text displayed when the user's platform is not supported.
UNSUPPORTED_TEXT.message: Sajnos az Ön által használt platform jelenleg nem támogatott. További információért lépjen a Chromebook Súgóba.

UNSUPPORTED_TEXT_MAC.description: Text displayed when the user's platform is not supported.
UNSUPPORTED_TEXT_MAC.message: Sajnos a Mac csak M37 vagy újabb verziójú Chrome-mal támogatott. Kérjük, frissítse a Chrome-ot M37-re. Emiatt elképzelhető, hogy béta csatornára kell váltania.

UNSUPPORTED_TITLE.description: Title displayed when the user's platform is not supported.
UNSUPPORTED_TITLE.message: Az Ön által használt platform jelenleg nem támogatott

UNSUPPORTED_TITLE_LINUX.description: Title displayed when the user's platform is not supported.

UNSUPPORTED_TITLE_MAC.description: Title displayed when the user's platform is not supported.

UNSUPPORTED_TITLE_WIN.description: Title displayed when the user's platform is not supported.

WARNING_OFFLINE.description: Warning message that is shown to the user when his device is offline.
WARNING_OFFLINE.message: Az eszköz offline van. Kizárólag az offline funkciók lesznek elérhetők.

WELCOME_TEXT.message: Egy olyan 4 GB-os vagy nagyobb kapacitású USB-meghajtóra vagy SD-kártyára lesz szüksége, amelyen a már meglévő tartalmak törölhetők.

WRITE_MESSAGE.description: Shown on the screen where the drive is being created
WRITE_MESSAGE.message: Ne távolítsa el a helyreállítási adathordozót!

WRITE_TITLE.description: Title of the screen where the drive is being created
WRITE_TITLE.message: A helyreállítási képfájl létrehozása folyamatban van
